comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC: Bain's photo caption gives each man his rank (abbreviated).

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan:

Thanks for pointing out the additional information.  Admiral Frank F. Fletcher and Admiral Charles J. Badger are depicted here on the USS Wyoming as Fletcher took over command from Badger of the Atlantic fleet in September 1914.  We will add all of these details to the record when we update.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: The third officer, pictured but not identified in the caption, is Rear Admiral Bradley A. Fiske, aide for operations to Secretary Daniels of the Navy.
